name: Mango and Goat Cheese Delight
author: Lana MacKenzie
summary: This is absolutely heavenly. My sister made this for me one day, and now I cannot get enough of it.
ingredients: 1 bunch watercress, torn into bite sized pieces
1 (10.5 ounce) package herbed goat cheese, sliced into 1/4 inch thick pieces
directions: Arrange the watercress on a serving platter
Top each piece with a slice of mango
Place the eggs and the bread crumbs in separate small bowls
Coat goat cheese pieces with bread crumbs, dip in the egg, and coat again with bread crumbs
Arrange coated goat cheese pieces in a single layer on a medium baking sheet
Broil in the preheated oven 2 to 4 minutes per side, until lightly browned
Arrange atop the watercress and mango to serve
